 Al Queda fall apart? You keep making this foolish statement, despite the fact that AQ is bigger and better funded than it ever has been. There have been more attacks in the last year than ever before. Like a fool, you are forgetting that this is fourth generation warfare, one of the primary goals of which is to alienate your opponent from their supporters and allies. AQ is doing an excelent job of this. The price of supporting American is getting steep. Odds are, support of the US will earn you attacks.
